alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, western Crittenden and southeastern Cross Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Parkin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hughes, Madison, Widener, Jennette, New Home, Whitmore, Cottonwood Corner, Penjur, Jonquil, Burnt Cane, Round Pond, Greasy Corner, Cicalla, Heth, Blackfish, Clarks Corner, Kinton, North Hughes, Hicks Station and Lucerne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
